job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: Research amp Insights Deloitte Services LLPbrbrWe are looking for a teammate who will bring a blend of thoughtful data driven curiosity and pragmatism If you want to both design and deploy impactful datadriven research to a global audience then we want you on our teambrbrData Science and Survey Advisory Services Research amp Insights Data Scientists play a key role developing research products that work to change perspectives on major business and government issues Our Data Scientists are involved in all stages of the research process including working with internal clients to define research projects research execution presenting findings and coauthoring public facing research reports Strong candidates will be both thorough and creative in their research approaches comfortable with public speaking precise amp concise writers and able to both deliver and receive candid feedbackbrbrstrongDuties and ResponsibilitiesbrstrongulliExecutes endtoend research processes working with internal clients to define research topics to conducting rigorous analysis Ensures research utilizes appropriate methodologies multivariate statistical modeling text analytics network analysis time series analysis econometrics psychometrics etcliliWorks collaboratively on a serviceoriented team which supports numerous research requests covering multiple industry areas eg consumer energy finance government media technology etcliliBalances the demands of multiple longterm projects simultaneouslyliliPresents on research findings to senior leadership both within and outside of DeloittebrliulOur Data Scientists play a key role in generating research into pivotal phenomena impacting US businesses and the US government Our Data Scientists are required to occasionally travel a few times a year at most to attend offsite meetings conferences andor training sessionsbrbrRequired Skills and CapabilitiesbrulliExperience with Python andor RliliPrior experience that has involved extensive use of at least two of the methodologies belowliliEconometricsStatistical Modeling Linear Regression Time Series Analysis etcliliInteractive Visuals Power BI MarketSight Tableau Qlik etcliliMachine Learning Random Forests Clustering etcliliText Analytics Topic Modeling Natural Language Processing Sentiment Analysis etcliliNetwork Analysis Particularly SocialliliNeural Networks Artificial Convolutional or RecurrentliliGeostatisticsSpatial Modeling Geographic information Systems Spatial Regression etcliliBachelors degree in Data Science Statistics Quantitative Behavioral Science other highly quantitative fieldliliTravel up to 10 While 10 of travel is a requirement of the role due to COVID19 nonessential travel has been suspended until further noticeliliMust be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship now or at any time in the futurebrliulstrongDesired Skills and CapabilitiesbrstrongulliMasters or PhD in Data Science Statistics Quantitative Behavioral Science or other highly quantitative fieldliliAbility to work independently with minimal supervision as well as in a collaborative team environment liliPrior publication of work please provide links if possibleliliExperience managing datadriven research from project ideation to deploymentliliDeep expertise in Python or RliliWorking knowledge of SQL Structured Query LanguageliliFamiliarity with data visualization software such as MarketSight Power BI Tableau etcliul
